feed.title: Provisions (was: PSA: Taproot loss of quantum protections)

entry.title: Provisions (was: PSA: Taproot loss of quantum protections)
entry.summary: In this conversation, Andrew and ZmnSCPxj discuss Taproot ring signatures, which is a proposed upgrade to the Bitcoin protocol. Jonas contributed to the discussion as well, and his work was referenced in a Twitter post by Andrew. The group also provides links to resources for further reading on the topic, including the Taproot Uses page on Bitcoin Wiki and a GitHub repository for Taproot ring signatures authored by Jonas. The original poster plans to spend their weekend delving into the information provided and expects to have more questions as a result.
